data.text: @Crosseyed @MLevitt_NP2013 What to do may be debatable but there was a huge amount of previous research about what not to do from an educational& psychological angle. Someone with access to stuff behind academic paywalls should pull it out to show its destructiveness was common knowledge @NickHudsonCT
@tatyana_md_phd @MLevitt_NP2013 apparently you cannot read scientific literature. how can you get your degree?
